master ball.name: Master Ball
master ball.description: The best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

poke ball.name: Poke Ball
poke ball.description: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokemon, comfortably encapsulating it's target.

great ball.name: Great Ball
great ball.description: A good, high-performace Poke Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball can.

ultra ball.name: Ultra Ball
ultra ball.description: An ultra-high performance Poke Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokemon than a Great Ball.

cherish ball.name: Cherish Ball
cherish ball.description: A quite rare Poke Ball that has been crafted in order to commemorate a special occasion of some sort.

dive ball.name: Dive Ball
dive ball.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well when catching Pokemon that live underwater

fast ball.name: Fast Ball
fast ball.description: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon that are usually very quick to run away.

friend ball.name: Friend Ball
friend ball.description: A strange Poke Ball that will make the wild Pokemon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.

heal ball.name: Heal Ball
heal ball.description: A remedial Poke Ball that restores the HP of a Pokemon caught with it and eliminates any status conditions.

level ball.name: Level Ball
level ball.description: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon that are at a lower level than your own Pokemon.

love ball.name: Love Ball
love ball.description: A Poke Ball that works best when catching a Pokemon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokemon.

lure ball.name: Lure Ball
lure ball.description: A Poke Ball that is good for catching Pokemon that you reel in with a Rod while out fishing.

luxury ball.name: Luxury Ball
luxury ball.description: A particularly comfortable Poke Ball that makes a wild Pokemon quickly grow friendlier after being caught.

moon ball.name: Moon Ball
moon ball.description: A Poke Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokemon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

nest ball.name: Nest Ball
nest ball.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that becomes more effetive the lower the level of the wild Pokemon.

net ball.name: Net Ball
net ball.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water or Bug type Pokemon.

premier ball.name: Premier Ball
premier ball.description: A somewhat rare Poke Ball that was made as a commemorative time used to celebrate an event of some sort.

repeat ball.name: Repeat Ball
repeat ball.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon species that have been caught before.

timer ball.name: Timer Ball
timer ball.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that becomes progressively more effective the more turns that are taken in battle.

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to an injured Pokemon.

super potion.name: Super Potion
super potion.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to an injured Pokemon.

hyper potion.name: Hyper Potion
hyper potion.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokemon.

max potion.name: Max Potion
max potion.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It will completely restore the max HP of a single Pokemon.

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokemon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokemon's maximum HP.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: A spray-type medicine for poisoning. It can be used once to lift the effects of being poisoned from a Pokemon.

paralyze heal.name: Paralyze Heal
paralyze heal.description: A spray-type medicine for paralysis. It can used once to free a Pokemon that has been paralyzed.

burn heal.name: Burn Heal
burn heal.description: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can used once to heal a Pokemon suffering from a burn..

ice heal.name: Ice Heal
ice heal.description: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokemon that been frozen solid.

awakening.name: Awakening
awakening.description: A spray-type medicine used against sleep. it can be used once to rouse a Pokemon from the clutches of sleep.

full heal.name: Full Heal
full heal.description: A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokemon.

big malasada.name: Big Malasada
big malasada.description: The Alola region's local specialty fried. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokemon.

energy powder.name: Energy Powder
energy powder.description: A bitter medicine powder. When consumed, it restores 60 HP to an injured Pokemon.

energy root.name: Energy Root
energy root.description: An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed, it restores 120 HP to an injured Pokemon.

ether.name: Ether
ether.description: This medicine can restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

full restore.name: Full Restore
full restore.description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokemon and heal any status conditions it has.

lava cookie.name: Lava Cookie
lava cookie.description: Lavaridge Town's local specialty. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokemon.

lemonade.name: Lemonade
lemonade.description: A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed, it restores 70 HP to an injured Pokemon.

max elixir.name: Max Elixir
max elixir.description: This medicine can fully restore the PP of all the moves that have been learned by a Pokemon.

max ether.name: Max Ether
max ether.description: This medicine can fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

max revive.name: Max Revive
max revive.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokemon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokemon's maximum HP.

old gateau.name: Old Gateau
old gateau.description: The Old Chateau's hidden specialty. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokemon.

sweet heart.name: Sweet Heart
sweet heart.description: A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokemon.
